title: The Reaper King - Novel Updates
author: Lee Dae Sung   이대성
description: A boy who managed to attain the eyes of fate through a deal with the Demon King, Gongson Chun Gi. But the deal came with a heavy cost. Gongs Chun Gi’s resistance against his unfair fate. The king of the dead, the Reaper King, descends into the martial world!>
